articles.description: The New Kids on the Block have announced the MixTape Tour 2022, and they'll be bringing along classic acts Salt-N-Pepa, Rick Astley and En Vogue.
articles.content:
There's a fresh MixTape Tour coming your way from New Kids on the Block, and this one's going to be a must-see for 1990s music fans!

articles.title: Disney Utilizes Massive Facebook Outage to Promote Monorail Changes on Twitter - Inside the Magic
articles.description: Facebook is down, so Disney is going to Twitter to join the masses and promote one of their new offerings. Check it out.
articles.content: If there is one thing that many of us have realized by now, it is that Facebook and Instagram are both down. When something dramatic, like two of the major social media moguls going down, people floc… [+2284 chars]

articles.title: Billie Eilish Almost Canceled Texas Show After Abortion Ban - The Cut
articles.description: She was among other celebrities, including Amy Schumer and Jennifer Lawrence, to voice support of abortion rights over the weekend.
articles.content: Saturday night, Billie Eilish performed at the Austin City Limits festival to a sold-out crowd. However, Eilish revealed onstage that she almost pulled out of the music fest after Texas passed its hy… [+3359 chars]

articles.title: No Time To Die scores record £87.7m international opening weekend - Daily Mail
articles.description: Unsurprisingly, the biggest pull came in the UK and Ireland, with a reach of £10.4m ($14.2million) total - adding to Friday's £5.6million ($7.6 million)
articles.content:
The latest James Bond film No Time To Die scored an overseas record amid the pandemic with a £87.7million ($119.1 million) international opening in 54 markets.
